string.name: parent
string.value: The Chaos behind Alfonse Green and the Nependeath Juice
I need to look for Ericsson.

I got Ericsson a present for his cat, and he was so ecstatic over it that he promised to make me a #bSap of Nependeath#k. 

 #t4000058# #b#c4000058##k/150
 #t4000062# #b#c4000062##k/80
I got the #bSap of Nependeath#k from Ericsson. I should take this to #bElma the Housekeeper#k immediately!
Oh wow, this wristband is gorgeous~ No doubt this should look great on my cat Nero. Is this really for Nero??

Thank you so much! I can't believe you got this for my cat ... alright! You said you needed #b#t4031200##k, right? I'll make it for you! Just remember, in order to make #t4031200#, you'll need to hunt the ever-so-dangerous Nependeath.
You look strong enough, so that shouldn't be too much of a problem. To make a sap, I'll need #b200 #t4000058#s and 100 #t4000062#s#k. You can get them, right?
If that's not for my lovely Nero, then why are you even showing it to me? Are you trying to make me mad? Get out of my sight!
You brought all the ingredients I asked you to get! Wait here, as I make #t4031200# for you.
Here, take it! Take this to Elma the Housekeeper; she is the best at making the #b#t4031202##k.
I don't think you have all the ingredients yet. Hurry up and get them!
